comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: General Sickles died on May 3, 1914. The funeral, in New York City, was held on May 8. He was buried in Arlington National Cemetery, outside Washington, D. C. New York Times story, May 9, 1914, of the funeral in New York City, at St. Patrick's Cathedral: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9807E0D71E39E6...
